Cheese pizza is typically made by spreading tomato sauce on a pizza dough and then topping it with cheese and other desired ingredients, such as meats, vegetables, and herbs. The pizza is then baked in an oven until the cheese melts and the crust is golden brown.

Cheese pizza is typically made by spreading tomato sauce onto a pizza crust and topping it with shredded or sliced mozzarella cheese. Additional toppings such as pepperoni, sausage, vegetables, and herbs can also be added. The pizza is then baked in an oven until the cheese is melted and bubbling.
